properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, string) The name of the container.

properties.name: image
properties.description: (Required, string) The ID of the image to back this container.It must be a public image on DockerHub.

properties.name: instances
properties.description: (Optional, int) The count of the instance. It must be between 1 and 10.

properties.name: plan
properties.description: (Optional, string) The plan of the Arukas. It must be free or hobby or standard-1 or standard-2.

properties.name: endpoint
properties.description: (Optional,string) The subdomain part of the endpoint assigned by Arukas. If it is not set, Arukas will do automatic assignment.

properties.name: ports
properties.description: (Required , block) See Ports below for details.

properties.name: environments
properties.description: (Required , block) See Environments below for details.

properties.name: cmd
properties.description: (Optional , string) The command of the container.
ports is a block within the configuration that can be repeated to specify the port mappings of the container. Each ports block supports the following:

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional, string) Protocol that can be used over this port, defaults to tcp,It must be tcp or udp.

properties.name: number
properties.description: (Optional, int) Port within the container,defaults to 80, It must be between 1 to 65535.
environments is a block within the configuration that can be repeated to specify the environment variables. Each environments block supports the following:
